questions: Curtain is hanging at the entrance of a room. A long corridor runs at right angles to the door, that is parallel to the curtain. If a strong wind blows along the corridor, the curtain will:

option1: Outside air pressure is more than  inside the bottle

option3: Outside air pressure is equal to the  inside the bottle
